keyPolicies.policyDescription: 1,000 more nurses in Scotland funded by a UK-wide mansion tax on properties worth over £2 million
Fair pay with an £8 an hour Minimum Wage by 2020 and a Living Wage
Ban on exploitative zero hours contracts
Guarantee of a job, training or apprenticeship for young people paid for by a tax on bankers' bonuses
Tackle tax avoidance and invest the revenues in good public services
